name: Kombinatronics
description:
Kombinatronics is a game about combining dice to fulfill dice orders. Drag the dice across the board, combine them with other dice to reach the required point count and fulfill as many orders before you get overwhelmed and the game ends.

CONTROLS:

- Hold left mouse button to drag dice, touch two dice to combine
- Click red button to request more dice

Made by svenunit, yarenlen, FragDenIndra and Akiar for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
